metadata.synopsis: This AD will trigger just after killing every Githyanki at Knights of the Shield Hideout.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill every githyanki in the Knights of the Shield Hideout.Main enemy here: S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_Inquisitor_54467aa9-33dd-41c4-bd77-87a71ed22c16

1.text: Good. Peace at last. Now look behind the statue - there's a way through. I'll reveal the mechanism to you.

2.text: Vlaakith is relentless. You handled it well. Let us hope she exhausts her forces soon.

0.text: Now search the room. There's a statue that conceals the way through. I'll reveal it to you.

3.text: They tracked the artefact all this way... you handled them well.
